intro: Reynoutria yunnanensis, commonly known as Yunnan arrowhead, is a species of flowering plant in the family Polygonaceae. It is native to China, particularly in the Yunnan province, and thrives in moist, shady environments. The plant is characterized by its heart-shaped leaves and clusters of small, greenish-white flowers. It is often found in mountainous regions and along stream banks. Due to its ornamental value and adaptability, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens and wetland habitats.
